alert.note: Alert for Pottawatomie (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 18 at 12:00AM CDT until June 18 at 2:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR NORTHEASTERN GARVIN...SEMINOLE...NORTHWESTERN PONTOTOC... POTTAWATOMIE AND SOUTHEASTERN MCCLAIN COUNTIES... At 1200 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 3 miles southwest of Earlsboro to near Byars to 4 miles west of Antioch, moving southeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Shawnee, Seminole, Tecumseh, Wewoka, Konawa, Byng, Maud, Earlsboro, Bowlegs, Asher, Tribbey, Wanette, Cromwell, Johnson, Fitzhugh, St. Louis, Brooksville, Macomb, Vanoss, and Little. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
